definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: mix, stir (Ar. rabaka mix, mingle; NH [[רְבִיכָה]], Targum [[רָבִיכָא]] [for BH [[מֻרְבֶּכֶת]]], (dough) mixed, or stirred);—

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pt. f. as term. techn. In sacrif., alw. of [[סׂלֶת]] well mixed, [[מֻרְבֶּכֶת]] Le 6:14, Le 7:12, [[הִימּרְבָָּכֶת]] 1Ch 23:29.
